attributes.action: help single parents that get there own parents to look after their children while at work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the current system there is help for those people that get child minders to care for there children while at work.
But there is nothing for the parents and grandparents that do exactly the same thing which i think in my mind is very unfair. I am a single parent and i can't afford a child minder even with the help that is avaliable so my mum has my daughter while i go to work.
